title: US-Russian woman jailed for 12 years for $51 charity gift
content: Ksenia Karelina was found guilty of treason in Russia for donating to a charity supporting Ukraine.
summary: Ksenia Karelina was found guilty of treason in Russia for donating to a charity supporting Ukraine.

title: Arrest made over Matthew Perry's death - US media

title: Foetuses can be called 'unborn humans' for Arizona abortion vote

title: More than half of Puerto Rico without power as Hurricane Ernesto strengthens
